mapper.insert: insert into post (user_id, board_id, post_title, post_description, post_image,post_iframe,post_header,post_state,post_date,post_like) values ( #{user_id}, #{board_id}, #{post_title}, #{post_description} , #{post_image}, #{post_iframe}, #{post_header}, #{post_state},now(),0)
mapper.delete: delete from scrap where post_id = #{post_id} and user_id = #{user_id};
delete from postLike where post_id = #{post_id} and user_id = #{user_id};
mapper.select: select p.post_id, p.user_id, p.post_date, p.post_title, p.post_description, p.post_image, p.post_iframe, p.post_header, p.post_state, l.like_count, c.comment_count from (select post_id, count(post_id) as like_count from postLike group by post_id) as l right outer join post as p on l.post_id = p.post_id left outer join (select post_id, count(post_id) as comment_count from comment group by post_id) as c on p.post_id = c.post_id where p.board_id = #{board_id};
select * from post where post_title like concat('%',#{keyword} ,'%') or post_description like concat('%',#{keyword} ,'%') order by post_date desc;

select * from post as p join (select count(post_id) as like_count, post_id from postLike group by post_id) as c on p.post_id = c.post_id where post_title like concat('%',#{keyword} ,'%') or post_description like concat('%',#{keyword} ,'%') order by c.like_count desc;
